articles.author: Brendan Morrow
articles.title: Rihanna's first concert since 2016 took place at Anant Ambadi party - USA TODAY
articles.description: Rihanna gave a rare performance in India this weekend at pre-wedding festivities for Anant Ambani, son of Mukesh Ambani, the richest man in Asia.
articles.content:
Rihanna's return to performing live took place at an unexpected venue this weekend.
The Grammy-winning singer, 36, performed in Jamnagar, India, on Friday as part of the pre-wedding festivities for … [+2179 chars]
